name: Island Getaway VR
description:
Get away from the real world and warp into your very own virtual island full of activities!This game is being developed side-by-side with the community so make sure to leave suggestions for new activities!


-Play at your own pace
-Intuitive controls
-Uses Arm Swing Locomotion to provide immersive movement without making the player sick
-Various activities for the player to get lost in paradise: Bowling, Hoops, Archery, Rock Climbing, Tennis and more!
-Sandbox style gameplay/exploration
-New content weekly!
